title: Hypermedia-Enhanced Short-Intensive Course for Wushu Fundamental Techniques

context.prior_knowledge: Basic physical fitness and mobile device usage experience
context.additional_context: A microlearning environment accessible anytime/anywhere via digital devices, offering personalized content based on learner diagnostic assessments.

learning_goals: Learners can perform Wushu basic postures (Ma Bu, Yong Tui, and Horse-Riding Stance) with over 80% accuracy within one week.
Learners can explain key movement principles of Wushu techniques through video tutorials and interactive quizzes.
Learners can self-diagnose skill proficiency by scoring over 75 points in formative assessments within a mobile app.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
